559700.name: The Eyes of Ara Demo
559700.description:
The Eyes of Ara invites you to escape to another place. Become enthralled in an award-winning Adventure-Puzzle game set in a gorgeous 3D environment. Explore a vast and ancient castle riddled with secret vaults and hidden rooms. Solve elaborate puzzles, locate lost treasures, and unravel an ancient mystery.

Weave your way through a tale of mystery and discovery. Solve numerous and varied puzzles to reveal long forgotten secrets. Locate the lost keepsakes of the former occupants, and discover stories of those who once called the castle home.

Demo Version

This demo includes a sequence of rooms and puzzles built from aspects from the full game, re-arranged into a custom sequence. It is designed to give you a condensed experience of what it is like to play the much larger full game. This demo has been shown at various trade shows and conventions including GX Australia, AVCon, and PAX Aus, and is now available for anyone to download and enjoy!

Supported Languages:

English, Français, Italiano, Deutsch, Español, Português-Brasil, Русский, 日本語, 简体中文, 한국어
559700.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语*, 俄语*, 法语*, 意大利语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 日语*, 韩语*, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西*, 简体中文*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
